text: visvasi striyarodane heliri; avaru tam'ma drstigalannu taggisidali, tam'ma managalannu kapadikollali mattu avaru tam'ma srngaravannu pradarsisadirali â€“ a paiki sahajavagi prakatavaguvudara horatu. Mattu avaru tam'ma hodikegalannu tam'ma edeya mele hoddukondirali. Mattu avaru tam'ma srngaravannu pradarsisabaradu â€“ tam'ma pati athava tam'ma tande, athava tam'ma patiya tande athava tam'ma putraru athava tam'ma patiya putraru athava tam'ma sahodararu athava tam'ma sahodarara putraru athava tam'ma sahodariyara putraru athava tamage aptaragiruva striyaru athava tam'ma dasiyaru athava tira nirasaktaragiruva sevaka purusaru athava mahileyara guttugala arive illada makkala horatu itararige. Mattu avaru, tavu adagisitta srngaravu prakatavaguva ritiyalli tam'ma kalugalannu appalisutta nadeyabaradu. Visvasigale, nivellaru seri allahana munde pascattapa padiri. Nivu vijayigalagabahudu
